meanings.definition: Having a strong stomach or digestive system.
meanings.sent1: She is so stomachy that she can eat spicy food without any problem.
meanings.sent2: His stomachy constitution allows him to enjoy a variety of foods without feeling sick.
meanings.sent3: Even after eating a whole pizza, her stomachy nature never fails to impress.
meanings.sent4: His stomachy resilience in the face of exotic dishes is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The stomachy hero devoured the giant burger in one bite, astonishing everyone.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the stomach in some way.
meanings.sent1: The stomachy texture of the fabric reminded her of a soft pillow.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a stomachy warmth that comforted him on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: The stomachy color of the walls made the room feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the stomachy shape of the vase with great detail.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the stew was so stomachy, it made her feel instantly hungry.
